alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 4:17PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nye County through 445 PM PDT... At 417 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Gabbs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Nye County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
